title: Stolen Lies
description: From USA Today bestselling author K Webster and Nikki Ash comes Stolen Lies: a romantic suspense.My life was brutal, horrific, ruthless.Dark.Until a beautiful bride was dragged into my life.I took her as my prize and made her mine.Vengeance never tasted so sweet.I see her truths every day, and it’s hard not to fall for a woman who makes me weak.She can try to run, but I have no intention of ever letting her go.I wanted to marry for hate, but it looks like hate is a lie.*Stolen Lies is the gripping conclusion in the Truths and Lies Duet*
author: K. Webster
